p: Statistical analysis of the data set corresponding to the essential oil yields within the species was performed using Statgraphics Centurion XVII.I version 17.1.06 software package (Statgraphics Technologies, Inc., The Plains, VA, USA). A variance analysis (ANOVA) was used to determine statistically significant differences within the species. A statistically significant difference at a p-value of the F-test below 0.05 was considered.
